# Luff

> Luff is a collection of 7 standalone CLI tools for life management — tasks, calendar, email, and health tracking. Each tool compiles to a zero-dependency binary via Bun and is distributed through Homebrew. All credentials are stored securely in macOS Keychain.

## Docs

- [Getting Started](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/getting-started): Install via Homebrew, set up credentials, verify connection
- [Authentication Guide](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/guide/authentication): OAuth2, API token, and email/password auth flows
- [Multi-Account Guide](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/guide/multi-account): Managing multiple accounts in cal and mail
- [Architecture](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/reference/architecture): Monorepo structure, provider pattern, build system, release pipeline

## Tools

- [todo](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/todo): Task management CLI powered by Todoist — projects, labels, filters, natural language quick-add
- [cal](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/cal): Google Calendar CLI with multi-account support — agenda, events, quick-add, flexible time parsing
- [mail](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/mail): Email CLI for Gmail and Fastmail — multi-account inbox, search, archive, flag
- [whoop](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/whoop): WHOOP health data — recovery scores, sleep stages, workout strain, HRV
- [garmin](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/garmin): Garmin Connect CLI with 20+ metrics — training readiness, body battery, stress, VO2 max
- [libre](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/libre): FreeStyle Libre 3 CGM data — real-time glucose, trend arrows, TIR analysis
- [rescuetime](https://serhiitroinin.github.io/luff/tools/rescuetime): RescueTime productivity tracking — productivity pulse, categories, focus sessions
